description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Ready to escape from the galactic caves? Challenging levels await you so watch out! You might encounter unpleasant surprises!  Can you make it to the top of the Best Times list?   Will you still be able to handle the stress of running out of time, fuel or health and making it to the end safely?
